result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Mitchell R Blood not in court.  Attorney jeramiah maynard in court for Mitchell R Blood.  Prosecuting attorney Vivien L. TenHaken in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is inpatient in Milwaukee as part of an ATR. Defendants appearance is waived today. Any Pending bail forfeiture to track to next court date. Minutes filed.
Status conference scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Memo from DOC Re: DOC approved treatment program and bond
Notice of Motion and Motion for Establishment of Discovery Deadlines.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Prosecutor

records.addlTxt: Not guilty plea entered and trial reserved.

2:00 PM Defendant in court in custody via video with atty J. Maynard. ADA Herrmann appears for the State or Wisconsin. Matter was scheduled for a preliminary hearing but the defendant wishes to waive his right to a preliminary hearing.  Response by Counsel and defendant to Court's questions.  Court finds defendant freely, knowingly and voluntarily waives his right to a preliminary hearing and binds the defendant over. Information filed. Not guilty plea entered, trial reserved. Bond addressed by defense, on p.o. hold. Inpatient treatment pending, DOC treatment facility. State does not object to remove cash component. Upon proof provided to the court of DOC approved program, cash component may be removed. If discharged or does not successfully complete, cash bond to be reinstated.
Status conference scheduled for September 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing scheduled for September 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Prosecuting attorney Samuel Thomas Berg in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Mitchell R Blood in court, in custody by video.  Attorney jeramiah maynard in court for Mitchell R Blood. Court inquired if victim wished to be heard; no statement made. Defendant given complaint; charges/penalties explained by the court. Reading of complaint waived. Rights given and preliminary hearing requested within time period. Minutes filed.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Cash bond filed. Defendant refused to sign.

*AMENDMENT 8-5-2022 -  Pursuant to hearing held on 7-18-2022, upon proof provided to the court of DOC approved program, cash component may be removed. If discharged or does not successfully complete program, cash bond to be reinstated. As of 8-5-2022, Court received proof of DOC approved program, cash component removed. 


BOND TOTAL CASE 22CF324 AND NEW REFERRAL (no case number yet). Defendant shall not possess or consume alcohol. Defendant shall not possess or use illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia. Defendant will not possess any firearms, ammunition or other weapons. NO VIOLENT CONTACT WITH K.R.H. dob 9-5-2002."No violent contact" includes threats through the mail, by telephone, by way of electronic device, in person or through a third party. Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.

Defendant Mitchell R Blood appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Samuel Thomas Berg in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Grace Hagerman appears specially. Called @ 1:23 p.m. Appearances made. Matter before the Court for adjourned initial appearance. Record by Atty. Hagerman that the SPD's office has not yet appointed counsel. Record by Atty. Berg as to new referral. Response by the Court who has no new referral filed. Atty. Berg reads notice of arrest into the record, asks that prior bond be forfeited and new total bond be set in the amount of $1,000.00 cash with same prior conditions.
Victim is present in Court and asks the Court to change the bond to no violent contact. Objection by the State. Response by Atty. Hagerman.  
Court will forfeit prior bond and set new cash bond in the amount of $1,000.00 with same prior conditions except no contact is amended to no violent contact with the victim. 
Matter assigned to Judge Koss and is scheduled for AIA on July 13, 2022 @ 1:15 p.m.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Notice to Person Posting Bond Money

Prosecuting attorney Samuel Thomas Berg in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Mitchell R Blood in court. Defendant qualifies for SPD. SPD was not able to appoint for today. Defendant given complaint; charges/penalties explained by the court. Reading of complaint waived. Minutes filed.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 5, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Signed bond filed with the court.

DEFENDANT MUST POST $500 CASH

Defendant shall not possess or consume alcohol. Defendant shall not possess or use illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia. Defendant will not possess any firearms, ammunition or other weapons. Defendant will not in any way contact or attempt to contact any victim(s) listed and will avoid their residence/place of employment or any place they are located and will avoid causing any other person, other than defendant's attorney, from doing so on defendant's behalf.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as through the mail, by telephone, by way of electronic device, in person, or through a third party.  VICTIM(S)/RESIDENCE(S): NO CONTACT WITH K.R.H. dob 9-5-2002. Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant. 

22-2673

Defendant Mitchell R Blood in court, in custody by video. JJ Crawford for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Mackenzie Renner for bond purposes only. Right to attorney, attorney options form given to defendant. Referred to SPD. Defendant on bond in Waukesha Co.  Minutes filed.
Hearing scheduled for June 16, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
